blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

title: Heart of Ice
body:
Gwen, a twenty-two year old mutant, joins the Avengers Initiative. Tony Stark Fan-Fiction. <3

Parents.

She couldn’t believe what she was seeing. Who she was seeing. The woman smiled. “Gwen? Darling, we’ve come to take you home,” she said in a simpering tone meant to console Gwen.“I am…

Read more…

tags: i'm going to reblog this until i'm no longer angry about it
title: streaming industry can suck it
body:
let me tell you about my motherfucking nightmare with streaming services, blurays, and the movie industry in fucking general (i try never to swear but oh my god).

Since 2008 I’ve been buying the Digital Download, extra-special, expensive Blu-Ray+DVD packs from Marvel. They stopped including the DVD and selling it on its own which was the first irritation, and started only including bonus material on the Blu-Ray release. My PS3 is the only device i own that plays Blu-Ray, but fine. i can at least watch the download in private.

Now, I use the Digital Downloads with my iTunes so I can take screenshots for my timeline project and whatever other nerdy thing I like to do. It’s easier than shuffling DVD’s and hoping my disk drive doesn’t break on me someday. 

Then, with Spider-Man: Homecoming, you can no longer just redeem the download with iTunes, you have to go through Sony’s site where they require you to make an account with them just to get your paid-for copy of this digital film. Didn’t work, Sony sucks, end of story.

No, actually, because all the other download codes require it too now through Disney’s special little soul-sucking site Movies Anywhere. I sign up with the bastards, try to download my movies (Black Panther and Infinity War) onto iTunes, and iTunes gives me some shit about an error. I’m already having a discussion with Movies-Only-With-Us about the fact that I made two accounts for two different movies could they please clear that up? but now they’re saying I have to fix this error issue with Apple first. It’s not even my account, it’s my dad’s so I have to involve him and that’s irritating and a half (he now insists I’m the cause of his missing music in iTunes, go figure). 

iTunes says “oh, you need to UPDATE itunes and the error message will go away.” Yeah, because the last two times I did that I didn’t immediately reverse it in order to get all my music and settings back. but i do it, it works, i make my dad change his ten y.o. password, which he bitches about but fine.

I finally finally FINALLY get both films to show up in my iTunes library. The tagline for downloading them spews some shit like “Download in seconds, saved forever!” and naturally it takes i-kid-you-not fifteen hours to download both films.

they’re in my library. i can watch them, in theory, at a later date.

i just tried them right now. 

they play fine.

BUT ITUNES BLOCKS SCREENSHOTS NOW. DIDN’T BEFORE, FOR ME, but now i guess they don’t want me “pirating” a whole film with the Windows snipping tool, even though i just need a dozen shots to put in my stupid nerdy timeline. now i have to get shady and download something shady just to remove their blocking so i can take some screenshots from the film i LEGALLY FUCKING PAID FOR. 

this, has been, a three week nightmare. i don’t even want the extra content, i can watch it for free on youtube, and they only put a sliver of the bts footage and like three deleted scenes on there anyway. $65 to get a film i can only watch on a PS3 on a big screen tv, and a digital download i’m only allowed to watch within their parameters on music software i rarely use.

long, rage-fueled story short…I’m buying cheap-ass dvds from now on. all i really need the damn film for is screenshots, and if in future it takes buying a pirated copy just to be able to do that?

body:
Best line

The best line Spider-Man had in avengers infinity war

Spider-man “I can’t be your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man if there no neighborhood”

Tony: *internally thinking damn that was a good line… can’t argue with this kid! He’s too damn smart…. THATS MY BOY!!!! *SOBS*

body:
Spider-Man

I remember the day I watched Spider-Man homecoming for the first time and my parents walked in at the part where Ned was in the computer lab while the dance was going on and legit they walked in when the teacher asked what Ned was doing there during the dance. And he said “uhhh watching porn”. Like they walked in on the ONE MOMENT that was awkward as hell!!! Fml!! Ahhhhh!!!

summary:
may: peter, you’ve been working on that lego ship for way too long. don’t you have homework due tomorrow?
peter: due tomorrow?...
body:
may: peter, you’ve been working on that lego ship for way too long. don’t you have homework due tomorrow?

peter: due tomorrow? more like do tomorrow, amiright? :D

may:

peter: :D

may:

peter: :D

*an hour later at tony’s doorstep*

peter: and that’s why she kicked me out mr. stark

tony:

peter: so, can i stay he-

tony: *slams door*

title: Ice to meet you
body:
Serena is thrown into the world of SHIELD whether she likes it or not.

What happens at SHIELD

My body felt numb, I couldn’t move a muscle. Finally, my eyes opened, and I took in my surroundings; a large lab, with lots of screens. I winced, looking at my bandages arm, the bandage red with dried…

Read more…

My body felt numb, I couldn’t move a muscle. Finally, my eyes opened, and I took in my surroundings; a large lab, with lots of screens. I winced, looking at my bandages arm, the bandage red with dried…
